abstract: Former French Pres Nicolas Sarkozy is under investigation on preliminary charges of illegal overspending through his former party, Union for a Popular Movement, during his failed re-election bid in 2012; denies knowledge of overspending.

headline.print_headline: Worlds Briefing | Europe; France: Sarkozy Is Under Investigation
headline.main: Nicolas Sarkozy Placed Under Investigation on 2012 French Election Charges

snippet: Mr. Sarkozy, the former president, was questioned on Tuesday by judges and notified of the preliminary charges for exceeding the limit for electoral spending.
lead_paragraph: Mr. Sarkozy, the former president, was questioned on Tuesday by judges and notified of the preliminary charges for exceeding the limit for electoral spending.
